Question
========

Two pure dice are rolled. *A* is the event: an even number comes on top of one die and an odd one on the other. What then is the probability of event *A*?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2
* 1/3
* 1/4
* 1/6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2: Incorrect
* 1/3: Incorrect
* 1/4: Correct
* 1/6: Incorrect
